description: This Kotlin source file defines the TvLauncherActivity class, which extends FlutterActivity and serves as the entry point for Android TV devices' Leanback launcher, sharing the same Dart entry point as the phone activity.

classes.name: TvLauncherActivity
classes.description: An Android activity class extending FlutterActivity, serving as the entry point for Android TV leanback launcher, shared with the phone activity.
